bio: Hi, I'm Lewis, and I'm a Full-Stack Developer based in Birmingham. I'm passionate about working with the latest technologies to build exciting and high-quality web applications, in addition to robust and scalable cloud backends. I am currently working on an extensive event-driven cloud platform used to publish news articles, built in AWS using Golang, Javascript, nginx and Lua. On the rest of the site you'll find my skillset, experience and portfolio. Enjoy!
